Usage¶

Different Settings:¶

Cross-Reference Tool¶

  • Setting to find cross-references and connections between input publications * If database tool is also turned on, the program will find connections the input publications has with publications already in the database * See Connections Page to see what connections are defined

Add To Database Tool¶

  • Setting to add extracted data into the database * Database schema must have tables and columns that are defined in Tables Page

Write To File Tool¶

Setting to write all extracted data into the same directories that contain figures and figure captions for a publication

Before Running the program¶

  1. Make sure GROBID is running in the background somewhere
  2. Path to PDFFigures2 is written in ConfigPaths.py
  3. Change AllowOCR = True in PDFFigures2
  4. Input and Output Directories is written in ConfigPaths.py
  5. Have all desired settings set to True or False in ConfigPaths.py

Running the program¶

In the HaptipediaExtractor directory, type in the command line run main.py

Haptipedia
